data.name: AdvanceError.Text
data.value: You have entered an invalid amount. Your settings have not been saved.

data.name: AmountSpecial.Text
data.value: Since you have a transaction over [TEAMLEADERLIMIT] in your reimbursement it must be approved by [AUTHUSER].

data.name: AuthSpecial.Text
data.value: Since you are the AuthUser, and your usual leader is inelligible to approve this reimbursement, it must be approved by the AuthAuthUser: [AUTHAUTHUSER].

data.name: DefaultSettingsText
data.value: *Warning - This module is using the default settings. Please review and save the module settings before using in a live environement

data.name: EmailApproverChanged.Text
data.value: It appears that your approver made changes to this reimbursement, before approving it. You can view this reimbursement by selecting it from the "Approved" section of the Reimbursement website.

data.name: EmailComments.Text
data.value: The following comments were submitted with this reimbursement:

data.name: ErrorInProgress.Text
data.value: This reimbursement cannot be unprocessed at this time, as it is currently being downloaded by the automatic datapump (transaction broker). You can try again in a few minutes, but be aware that it will already have been processed into your accounts program.

data.name: Expire.Text
data.value: Reimbursements must be made within [EXPIRE] months. This item you have entered is not within the [EXPIRE] months cut off period. If you reimburse this item it will be treated as extra salary and therefore incur tax.

data.name: LineTypes.Help
data.value: Please ensure that you enter your reimbursement under the correct type. If your expense doesn't fit under any other category, select other.

data.name: MarkProcessed.Text
data.value: Would you like to mark the downloaded transactions as 'Processed'?

data.name: MarkProcessedHelp.Text
data.value: If you are going to insert these transactions manually into your accounts package, you should select YES. Be aware that by selected YES, these transactions will be marked as processed and therfore ignored by the automatic datapump.

data.name: NextBatch.Text
data.value: This reimbursement will be downloaded in the next batch.

data.name: NoPostReceipts.Text
data.value: There are no receipts required, so you do not need to send anything to the office. The attached form is for your reference only.

data.name: PayOff.Help
data.value: Enter the amount you would like to pay off your loan.

data.name: PostReceipts.Text
data.value: Please post your receipts, on the attached form, to the national office.
data.comment: You might want to include the address here.

data.name: Printout.Text
data.value: Your printout has opened in a new window/tab. Don't forget to attach your receipts (if necessary) to this printout and send it to the office.

data.name: PrintoutMoreInfo.Text
data.value: Your printout has opened in a new window/tab. If you need to send in receipts for your reimbursement and you have not yet sent them in to the office, please attach them to this printout and send it to the office.

data.name: SplitError.Text
data.value: Please enter a description and an amount for all lines

data.name: SpouseSpecial.Text
data.value: Since your leader is also your spouse your reimbursement must be processed by [AUTHUSER].

data.name: Taxable.Text
data.value: * - Items marked with a * will be taxed.

data.name: AccountsMode.Text
data.value: You are in Accounts Mode. To switch to normal mode (as a normal staff member or Approver), close Edit Mode (bottom right).

data.name: ErrorHelp.Text
data.value: * Note: If the automatic download experiences an error whilst inserting transactions to the Accounts Program, the entire batch may be rejected. If you have multiple reimbursements in an error state - the problem might be with one of the other reimbursements.

data.name: Errors.Text
data.value: The following reimbursements are in an error state:

data.name: AdvIntro.Text
data.value: [STAFFNAME] has submitted an Advance Request for your approval:

data.name: AdvLocked.Text
data.value: Your advance has already been processed and cannot be changed or cancelled.

data.name: NextBatchAdvance.Text
data.value: This Advance will be downloaded in the next batch.

data.name: OutOfDate.Text
data.value: This expense is out of date and will be taxed.

data.name: OverideTax.Help
data.value: Use this setting to overide the tax setting. By default, the system will calculate tax based on the information provided by the user - but accounts staff can use this setting to overide this.

data.name: MoreInfo.Text
data.value: The finance team have requested that you supply more information for Reimbursement [RMBNO] - [USERREF].

data.name: MoreInfoMsg.Text
data.value: This reimbursment will be highlighted to the staff member on this page. However, you should email the staff member directly, to let him/her know what information you need.

data.name: AdvAmountSpecial.Text
data.value: Since you have a transaction over [TEAMLEADERLIMIT] in your advance, it must be approved by [AUTHUSER].

data.name: AdvAuthSpecial.Text
data.value: Since you are the AuthUser, and your usual leader is inelligible to approve this Advance, it must be approved by the AuthAuthUser: [AUTHAUTHUSER].

data.name: AdvSpouseSpecial.Text
data.value: Since your leader is also your spouse your advance must be processed by [AUTHUSER].

data.name: ExpireDept.Text
data.value: Reimbursements must be made within [EXPIRE] months. This item you have entered is not within the [EXPIRE] months cut off period. If you reimburse this item it will be treated as extra (from your STAFF ACCOUNT!) and incur tax.

data.name: ExpireImpossible.Text
data.value: Reimbursements must be made within [EXPIRE] months. This item you have entered is not within the [EXPIRE] months cut off period, and cannot be reimbursed.

data.name: cbExpenses.Help
data.value: Select this optoin to include Advance and Reimbursement payments. Expenses must be fully processed in Dynamics before the corresponding payment will appear on this report. (It may take up to 5 minutes after 'Posting' before it appears here).

data.name: cbSalaries.Help
data.value: Select this option to include staff salaries in the suggested payments download. You can set the salary for each staff member, from the Staff Admin page (Admin->AgapeConnect->Staff Admin).

data.name: lblBankAccount.Help
data.value: Select the Bank Account that you will use to pay staff. (You can set the default bank account under the Settings page of this module.).

data.name: lblWrongType.Text
data.value: This reimbursement uses an expense type that is not valid for this Responsibility Center. You must edit this line and select a valid expense type, before you can submit/process this reimbursement.

data.name: lblWrongTypes.Text
data.value: The Reimbursement contains expenses with incompatible expense types - highlighted in red. Some expense types are only valid or Personal Reimbursements and others for Department Reimbursements. To correct this, edit the line(s) and select a new (valid) expense type. You must fix these errors before your can Submit/Approve/Process this r.eimbursment.

data.name: lblAccountWarning.Text
data.value: There is not enough money in the R/C to cover this Reimbursement. Processing this Reimbursement may result in a negative account balance. Do you wish to continue?

data.name: ShortComment.Help
data.value: Your accounting program will probably have a limit on the number of characters in the Comment/Description field. For Dynamics/Solomon, this is typically 30 Characters (Including the staff initals). You can customise this descrption here.

data.name: lblElectronicReceipts.Help
data.value: Upload and image (jpg, png, gif) or a PDF as an Electronic Receipt.

data.name: OpenNewTab.Text
data.value: Click to view in new tab...

data.name: lblIncome.Text
data.value: The staff member has declared that they have received income (personally). This amount has been deducted from the amount payable to them. If this is donation income, please do not forget to book this donation in Donorwise.
